医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
高密度脂蛋白中的游离胆固醇与心血管疾病风险增加有关休斯敦卫理公会的研究人员发现，所谓“好”胆固醇的某些成分——高密度脂蛋白（HDL）——可能与心血管疾病患病率增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Free-cholesterol-in-HDL-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Free-cholesterol-in-HDL-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c203b07-f036-42a1-b01d-3f91ab763192 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 10:01:57 -0500 Free cholesterol in HDL linked to increased cardiovascular disease risk
图尔库大学将协调欧洲参考实验室进行百日咳和白喉控制欧盟委员会指定了欧洲参考实验室，以支持欧盟/欧洲经济区国家百日咳和白喉的控制和监测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/University-of-Turku-to-cooperative-European-Reference-Laboratory-for-pertussis-and-diphtheria-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/University-of-Turku-to-cooperative-European-Reference-Laboratory-for-pertussis-and-diphtheria-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10373057-0076-44a8-b1b8-e2f86f323478 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 09:51:33 -0500 University of Turku to coordinate European Reference Laboratory for pertussis and diphtheria control
AHCC 补充剂显示出保护肝脏免受纤维化的潜力慢性肝损伤可导致肝炎，从而导致肝脏纤维化。当肝星状细胞在肝炎期间被激活时，胶原蛋白和其他纤维组织的积聚会加速，通常会导致肝癌或肝硬化，这两种情况都可能致命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/AHCC-supplement-shows-pottial-in-protecting-the-liver-from-fibrosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/AHCC-supplement-shows-potential-in-protecting-the-liver-from-太多纤维化.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf068662-d387-4cec-8c51-e038b3e66547 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 09:16:18 -0500 AHCC supplement shows potential in protecting the liver from fibrosis
自我报告的步行速度可以预测代谢疾病风险步行速度可以提供对健康状况的洞察，其范围超出了单纯的移动能力，以至于它被认为是“第六生命体征”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Self-reported-walking-speed-can-predict-metabolic-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Self-reported-walking-speed-can-predict-metabolic-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=689737df-786e-452a-9ab3-a9902ab1d856 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 08:47:05 -0500 Self-reported walking speed can predict metabolic disease risk
减少血液稀释剂剂量可能会降低出血风险和医院就诊次数密歇根医学主导的一项研究表明，对于出现血栓后服用流行血液稀释剂的人来说，减少剂量可能会限制未来出血以及医院就诊的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Reduced-blood-thinner-dose-may-lower-bleeding-risk-and-hospital-visits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Reduced-blood-thinner-dose-may-lower-bleeding-risk-and-hospital-visits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d6bfc34-9a44-475d-b1fe-55c52b72f016 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 08:40:56 -0500 Reduced blood thinner dose may lower bleeding risk and hospital visits
研究发现水氟化对认知发展没有影响昆士兰大学的一项研究发现，幼儿时期接触氟化水与负面认知发展之间没有联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Study-finds-no-impact-of-water-fluidation-on-cognitive-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Study-finds-no-impact-of-water-fluidation-on-cognitive-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eac39db5-3b60-4a56-b634-af60bb65cd6b Thu, 19 Dec 2024 08:33:21 -0500 Study finds no impact of water fluoridation on cognitive development
跳舞可减轻帕金森病患者的抑郁症状约克大学研究人员在《医学互联网研究杂志》上发表的一项新研究显示，跳舞可以降低与帕金森病相关的抑郁症，其好处可以通过多种方式体现出来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Dancing-reduces-depression-symptoms-in-Parkinsons-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Dancing-reduces-depression-symptoms-in-Parkinsons-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba1102ae-a457-496a-b31f-5f6f4838f44d Thu, 19 Dec 2024 07:52:00 -0500 Dancing reduces depression symptoms in Parkinson's patients
过敏和哮喘患者的鼻真菌有所不同这项研究确定了哮喘和过敏患者鼻真菌成分的关键差异，深入了解它们在气道疾病动态中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Nasal-fungi-differ-in-people-with-allergies-and-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Nasal-fungi-differ-in-people-with-allergies-and-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48343d2d-5938-4ff7-9812-0fc8bba5352d Thu, 19 Dec 2024 07:45:00 -0500 Nasal fungi differ in people with allergies and asthma
特朗普当选后，奥巴马医改注册滞后，法律挑战由于即将卸任的拜登政府面临该计划的剧变，《平价医疗法案》下的新入学人数有望比去年创纪录的人数减少多达 100 万。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Obamacare-sign-ups-lag-after-Trump-election-legal-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Obamacare-sign-ups-lag-after-Trump-election-legal-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d23b0b4f-09de-4dbd-a11a-b05fbf37228b Thu, 19 Dec 2024 07:21:18 -0500 Obamacare sign-ups lag after Trump election, legal challenges
冥想可缓解创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）症状，超验冥想显示出重大益处研究表明冥想技巧，特别是先验冥想，可以显着缓解创伤后应激障碍症状，这提出了新的治疗途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Meditation-eases-PTSD-symptoms-with-transcendental-meditation-showing-major-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Meditation-eases-PTSD-symptoms-with-transcendental-meditation-showing-major-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9eb41ad-d734-4f1d-8a96-c360e53ac52a Thu, 19 Dec 2024 07:16:00 -0500 Meditation eases PTSD symptoms, with transcendental meditation showing major benefits
